Title: Relates to veterans' preferences with respect to civil service promotions
Summary: Relates to veterans' preferences with respect to civil service promotions; removes requirement of service during a time of war for additional points on civil service examinations for veterans.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 6 of article 5 of the constitution, in relation to civil service appointments and promotions; veterans' preferences and credits
